text: Eveline Widmer-Schlumpf (born 16 March 1956) is a Swiss politician. She was in office from 1985 to 2015. She was the President of the Swiss Confederation in 2012. She studied law at the University of Zürich. ==Other websites== *Profile of Eveline Widmer-Schlumpf *Official biography Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Graubünden
title: Eveline Widmer-Schlumpf
